title: Arianna Gracia
text: The tiktok app is really fun you get to make videos with really cool filters and get to watch live streams also I think that is pretty cool there are different people doing different stuff there are dancers,cosplayers,meme tiktokers, artists,video editers and other cool stuff you can watch and if you don't feel comfortable posting  yourself to the public there is a pravite sittings you can put on and no one can see your tiktoks except you so I think that's good if you don't feel comfortable putting your self in the public and also I really like that if you don't want to finish your video until later or the next day you can put it in drafts and it can save your video for you to finish I really like that a lot because sometimes it gets late and I have to go to bed and so I put it in draft's  to finish it the next day but I really recommend this app it's really cool !:)but there are a few changes on this app also hopefully in the future every body on this app can live stream because you canâ€™t live stream until 1,000 fans so I hope they can change that weâ€™re everybody can live stream! But other than that itâ€™s a really cool and fun app!

title: Reviewing TikTok
text: Honestly this app is really amazing itâ€™s hard to deal with getting banned for certain things because normally they donâ€™t tell you why so that you can fix it and you get banned for the dumbest things but thatâ€™s just how this app is to keep children and other people safe they are really fun to make videos and watch other people and get cool ideas and creativity and be able to put your brand or who you are out there for other people to see for parents that are concerned there are private settings and parent settings so you can be able to see everything that your child is to keep them safe and kids Iâ€™m sorry Iâ€™m exposing yâ€™all but I used to be exactly like you besides that I think everybody on this app is really good and really funny and you can link up with friends send funny videos to them comment down below on videos but there are settings for everything so just look! title: Addictively Amazing
text:
Hi! I live TikTok. Like, Iâ€™m addicted to it! However, I deleted the app, (and this was on my part,) and then re-downloaded it. When I re-downloaded it though, it said I wasnâ€™t a loud to use the camera or the microphone. The options and settings werenâ€™t there. I really with I knew how to fix it, so if you could find a way to respond or just fix it for me, I would be super grateful! 

   Okay, now on to the other parts. I would really like to be able to look up titles in my favorites, (captions for vids, effects and song title names) but you know, we canâ€™t YET. Also, a good idea is to be able to let only certain people see a TikTok , for the people that follow everyone back. (Therefore, everyone who followed them could see if they looked, because we can only put it on followers.) I think that being able to choose a few people to see it would be a great idea. Another idea, I want to be able to make it look like your account was deleted to some people, because they can to on a separate account if you found out you blocked them. 

   Thatâ€™s about it! Have a good day whoever is reading this! And PLEEEEAAASSEE fix the camera and mic problems! Byeeee!

title: Great app but things have happened
text:
This app is so fun but all of a sudden my account got deleted and I couldnâ€™t recover it, I have tried so many times to find my account but I couldnâ€™t find it, so now I have to start all over and I lost all of my followers, likes, and the people that I followed, wish I knew how to find my account but otherwise this app if fun. I would not use this app right now though because all of my content randomly got deleted and I was not doing anything wrong with my videos, I have spent countless hours trying to get my account back and I have not gotten a reason for my account being wiped out. I would appreciate it if I could get my account back. I have put so much work into my videos and I was just starting to get more likes and followers and then today I opened the app and it said I had to log in. At first I thought it was just a glitch but then I could not get my account back so I have lost everything.ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­. At first I loved this app but now itâ€™s hard since I canâ€™t find my account, I hope I can get an explanation about why my account was deleted. Thank you for taking the time to read this.

I was looking at TikToks and all of a sudden it doesnâ€™t work. For everyoneâ€™s profile it says no content. I could not see my videos either my profile page is blank. Please fix this.

title: The reason Iâ€™m giving it a low rating is...
text: Ok, just know that I have had this app for over 4 years now. This app is amazing. But I have found out, that some people that I know, are making different accounts, and TikTok is giving them more likes. My friend used to have at least 2 k likes, until she made more accounts and got even more. The second thing is the bullying. Many people are bullying and itâ€™s now getting to the point where Iâ€™m wanting to hurt myself. I wish that TikTok would actually listen to reports, instead of saying, â€œSorry, thereâ€™s nothing wrong with this userâ€. Then, thereâ€™s the part weâ€™re itâ€™s now blowing up your phone, saying, â€œThis persons liveâ€ or saying, â€œYou have 12 new notificationsâ€, â€œThis person liked your videoâ€, â€œThis person followed youâ€, and when it does this, it shows so many notifications, waking me up in the middle of the night when Iâ€™m trying to sleep! Iâ€™m getting really annoyed with this. One time, I was playing my favorite game, a notification from TikTok turned on, and it immediately logged me out of the game, making me leave my friends game! I really like this app, but this has to stop. This is one of the reasons why Iâ€™m failing at math in my school, from being sleep deprived! Seriously, fixed the dang thing.

title: Donâ€™t abide their own TOS
text:
Their TOS clearly states they donâ€™t allow accounts that impersonate other users yet they donâ€™t have a proper way to report this. The only options are â€œmeâ€ and â€œcelebrityâ€ and typically if someone pretends to be an acct they are usually smart enough to block the person theyâ€™re pretending to be, so the person being taken advantage of has no way to even know their likeness is being stolen unless someone tells them. And even if they are made aware, how exactly are they supposed to report a profile they canâ€™t see? And if theyâ€™re not a â€œcelebrityâ€ it doesnâ€™t matter? Make it make sense. 

I made a video and called this behavior out and it was reported and removed for â€œbullying and harassmentâ€ which I am absolutely not doing. There is no other way to illustrate the point besides posting the imposterâ€™s handle, and I bet you they are on an alternate acct (one I am unaware of) and are seeing and reporting my videos that way, bc itâ€™s like the moment I post it, theyâ€™re on me. I have received two strikes against my account just for speaking out against what is obviously NOT RIGHT!

All Iâ€™m asking for is for you to add the proper reporting menu options in order for people to be able to report a fraudulent account stealing the likeness of specific users, NOT just celebrities. Also please remove my strikes bc I did nothing wrong.

title: Guidelines very unfair
text: Iâ€™ve been creator for almost 2 years and worked hard to get to a following of 161k +.  I used to love the app so much, always spoke highly of it.  But recently with all the new guidelines itâ€™s no longer the app I fell in love with.  But itâ€™s not not just the guidelines, itâ€™s the fact that they donâ€™t seem to enforce them equally for everyone.  My account was taken down for sexual content and nudity, when that really didnâ€™t apply to my content and especially not compared to so much of the content you see on there with actual sexual activity and nudity.  Iâ€™ve known some other creators who have experienced the same and it seems to happen more and more.  TikTok seems to have its favorites (huge creators of course) and does not treat everyone equally.  I hate to say all this because I dedicated so much of my time to being a serious content creator on there, respecting everyone and the guidelines (so I thought) but with what just recently happened and also losing out on extra income I needed and being treated unfairly Iâ€™m pretty disappointed with what the app has become.

title: TikTok
text: Iâ€™ve been on Tik Tok for quite a long while so iâ€™ve finally decided to write a review. I love TikTok, I really do. It has a lot of fun videos, and the algorithm is amazingly accurate. Most of the people are kind. Some may argue that TikTok can be unsafe, which is true, but itâ€™s not as bad as you think. You can report and block people, and you can also make your account private so people canâ€™t see the videos you make and they have to request to follow you. You can comment on videos, unless the person who made the video decides to turn off comments. Thereâ€™s is also an option to privately chat with people, but Iâ€™m sure you can turn that off if you want to. If someone says anything uncomfortable, you can always block them too. The reason I give it four stars is mainly just bc of my own opinion. I think that TikTok can be negative, theyâ€™ll joke about anything and everything (mainly talking about gen-z) which can be tiring and not very nice if theyâ€™re making fun of personalities or looks. TikTok is also very addicting and can ruin your attention span, so do yourself a favor and SET A TIME LIMIT. In conclusion, you should get the app, just please be careful.

title: Playlists / Pockets
text: When first downloading Tiktok last summer, I thought itâ€™d allow me to save different videos based off how I choose to categorize them, because, well, the variety of Tiktok videos watchers get go a long way. After downloading and finding that I could only save them to one huge space, it didnâ€™t seem much of a problem. However over time, my saved pocket has gotten very filled, and I canâ€™t seem to find certain ones that I wished to save for later. It just all gets lost and I canâ€™t seem to keep track of everything. I think subcategories of the saved pocket would be a great idea. Make them into different categories and allow us to save the cooking vids to the pocket we want to title cooking or the POV vids to the pocket we title inspiration or POV. Just along those lines, I think the app would improve by so much. Allowing us to categorize our saved videos and keep them organized so we can have a better idea of where we put that one video we wanted to follow the steps on or keep for our bad days. Itâ€™d be a great addition and allow us so much more storage and head space !!

title: Supports racism
text: If I could give tik tok zero stars, I would. I deleted this app over a year ago due to its unjust policies and blatant support of racist language, content, and content creators. However, seeing black creators (I hope using the word black isnâ€™t considered inappropriate on this review like it is on the app itself) being used, not being paid equally, and shadow banned for speaking HISTORICAL truths is why I decided to write this review. Itâ€™s disheartening how boldly this app supports racism all while non people of color are taking content from black (oops) I mean, melanated folks content without crediting them. Iâ€™ve seen more melanated creators endure more mistreatment from an app that without tik tok dances, no one would know what to do with themselves. I find it interesting the terms â€œwhite powerâ€ and â€œwhite supremacyâ€ can just be typed freely but the term â€œblack successâ€ is flagged as â€œinappropriateâ€. We get it. You donâ€™t want black people to be successful unless your hands are dug in them for money. Itâ€™s how the country was built anyway. Remember, karma is real and you wonâ€™t stay on top forever. MySpace and Vine died off too. Only difference is, Tik Tok only values anyone who isnâ€™t black and those that will lie to appease those with fragile egos. Thanks for genuinely being terrible and I hope anyone with a hand in this atrocity of an app can do better. Love and light.

title: I love TikTok but this would be an amazing update
text: TikTok is beyond amazing.. yeah I know TikTok can cause insecurities and other things for people whatever. But TikTok is taking up 20+ gigabytes on my phone. I only have like about 10-15 videos posted and like maybe about 100 or less privates and almost five hundred drafts (but I go through and delete them and it will still stay the same). Kinda annoying. I also havenâ€™t had TikTok that long.. some people have like 1000+ videos posted and has had that account since musically and thereâ€™s is only taking 5-7 gigabytes. Iâ€™ve had it since February 2019. I think the reason itâ€™s taking up so much storage is because my favorites. I literally used to favorite every video I saw (and like it) about a year ago and once in awhile Iâ€™ll unfavorite every vid I see. But there is WAY too much videos (I swear like at least 5,000) so I think it would be awesome if yâ€™all updated it so people can delete stuff easier. Like just hold down and select the once you want to delete (like how you can when you delete photos from your iPhone). Does anyone else agree with me. Oh and I still have much more storage in my phone but overtime TikTok is gonna take all of my storage. Itâ€™s already taking up the most storage out of phone.

title: Downgraded quite a bit...
text: I got this app a while back like a year or so ago, because my friend made an account and was posting vids and I wanted to support her. And thatâ€™s when I started watching some others. I would always see so many cosplay videos and just people goofing around and having fun. Nowadays though I get on and itâ€™s nothing but skinny girls dancing, trying to lipsink songs they clearly barely know the words to, and Iâ€™ve seen a lot of vids of people making fun of cosplayers and stuff like that. I miss the old tik tok, back when it was mainly a platform for cosplayers, or at least thatâ€™s what it seemed to me. Donâ€™t get me wrong, I love animal vids and stuff like that, but I mean. Itâ€™s starting to seem more and more like Snapchat it and fb stories. Like, it used to be fun and diverse, now itâ€™s more just like; one chick on there does a dance move gains a couple thousand followers then EVERYBODY does that dance move and itâ€™s all you see and then they upload another vid with a different dance and the cycle repeats. I understand there are â€œtrendsâ€ but seriously. If this app is just gonna be everyone doing exactly the same thing everyone else is doing than whatâ€™s the point of having the app? At that point it just becomes â€œif youâ€™ve seen one, youâ€™ve seen â€˜em allâ€, ya know?

title: Coming from someone with 170k followers
text: Hi! so first off I want to say the content within the app is amazing and itâ€™s a really great community! I really enjoy making videos and being able to meet loads of other people from around the world :) however I do have some issues with the app and I feel like you could improve them. First and foremost, your customer support should be either a number or email, not support tickets. One time my live got banned for no reason ( I was literally sitting there drinking almond milk for 10 minutes ) and it took 2 weeks to get my livestream back. Also i recently got a new phone because my other one was damaged completely. I also got a new number. Because of this I canâ€™t get into my account whatsoever and Iâ€™ve sent about 5 support tickets trying to get my account back and I canâ€™t. I have 170k followers that I have worked so very hard for and I feel that your support ticket system isnâ€™t a sufficient way to communicate back and forth with your users. Itâ€™s extremely frustrating to not be able to make videos anymore or do live-streams. Please make a customer service email ASAP or a phone number. I am begging you. It would be so much more efficient.

title: Annoyed?
text: Hey, huge fan of this app, however, Iâ€™ve had 3 accounts total and only use 1 at a time. My first account (a couple years ago) I deleted successfully with no complications. Now that Iâ€™m on my 3rd account, I went back to delete my second (made a new one due to my password not working and not being able to login) and had no problems logging in (uggh). But now that I have 2/3 of the accounts deleted and want to login into my main account, it wonâ€™t let me due to â€œwrong account or passwordâ€ which then leads me to an email section. So I typed in the two possible emails and it still says that the account is wrong... I canâ€™t use the phone number login because my newest (3rd) account was never set up with it because â€œphone number already usedâ€.. so Iâ€™ve never got to have the full usage of the app through the messaging, which is unfortunate. I hopped onto my computer to try to find a support number and couldnâ€™t find anything except an email for business inquiries... lame. So now Iâ€™m stuck without an account and donâ€™t plan on making a new one because I just want to use this current account. In the end, I hope to have my current account, email connected and phone number connected so I can actually use the message section.

title: Loved it before
text: I freaking hate this update.1) I hate the new â€œfastâ€ because transitions are better and look a lot smoother before the update. 2)Also now when I turn it to my back camera thereâ€™s no flash. 3) the privates or now they call them drafts were WAY more convenient before the update. Now you have to click on the musically , click on the box, and after you watch it you have to click out, click exit, and then u can scroll to a different private. 4) so letâ€™s say you saved a sound, you go to ur drafts *take a year to get to the editing* and now you canâ€™t just click on the sound circle you have to delete every single segment you canâ€™t reshoot you have to delete segment anytime, which some privates I love the sound but I have to delete every segment to use it and my privates are actual tries so thereâ€™s a lot of transitions, I think you can favorite a sound though to prevent this problem but I have no clue how. But if ur still reading this thank you and I love musically the way it was before the update. Yes the new filters are fun and I still do use the app but if it were my design of the app I would keep the face filters te reg filters and the like â€œsoul, illusion, etc.â€ filters and then take those from the update and add them to the old musically. Anyways thanks for reading (if u still rğŸ˜‚) !!!!

title: Beyond disappointed.
text: I have been using tiktok for years. Since it was musically. I enjoyed so much, and yesterday night I opened my phone to a notification stating my account had been disabled, â€œdue to me being under the age of 13â€. Which simply is not true. I am not over 18 but am certainly over of the age of 13, very obvious. You had a long process to even just submit an appeal which was inefficient, it asked for â€œid, drivers license ect.â€ All of which i donâ€™t have possession of, which should not matter, since 12 and or 13 year olds donâ€™t have anyway, I am 14. I had several videos with friends and family, all wholesome, All lost. Also it states in the App Store, â€œ12+â€ which to mean means 12 and over. So the reason in â€œunder the age of the 13â€, simply is not reasonable. I spent so much time building an algorithm, videos, a following a favorites just for that all to be took away due to a assumption thatâ€™s not true. I am glad they have some restrictions but maybe pay more attention to what is actually being put on the app compared to whoâ€™s on the app. I have see dozens of videos which beyond inappropriate sights that have blown up and nothing is done about it. So to sum up donâ€™t have anything you would want to keep on the app. And for tiktok, figure it out, and I hope you will contact me to get this figured out.

title: My phonics videos. I enjoy many of the informational videos, of various types.
text: â€œK-I-S-Sâ€ comes to mind. â€œSIMPLEâ€, to the point messages. â€œKEEPâ€, â€œITâ€ that way, â€œSUPERSTARâ€œ! We are all hungry for information, short and sweet, to the point ALWAYS works very well! Some negative comments about religion hurt our global community by putting doubts in peopleâ€™s minds, especially young people. We need a moral compass. Yes, all organized religion have their short coming. But, there are ways to point that out without condemning it. It takes years of study, research, wisdom and daily practice to see the pros and cons. Itâ€™s too easy to have a bad experience, or not to see miracles, then blame isolated incidences, by stereotyping religions. There are bad people everywhere. There are good people, who do or think bad things. That is what the human entity isâ€¦not perfect, by no means. We each must do good, to better our world. That moral compass comes in pretty handy. Without it weâ€™ll will eventually see the end of civilization. Too much â€œHOLLYWOODâ€ religionâ€¦ itâ€™s all about me, my status, my things, do â€œmeâ€, without thinking about consequences. Yes, darn, those consequences!

title: The notification view update makes the nearly app unusable.
text: The â€œnotifications inboxâ€ update makes the app miserable to use & interact with comments. You have to dig deep to even find comments and then it only shows you a small portion of them because when you get past 20, there is a tab that shows â€œpeople you may knowâ€ instead of the rest of your comments. The â€œpeople you may knowâ€ tab pops up constantly too, because even if you have contacts shut off it STILL accesses them. It uploaded all my phone contacts & Fb friends despite never having that feature turned on & intentionally double checking it was off. Invasion of privacy for sure. They  updated the home page/inbox layout too. So you canâ€™t just click the inbox icon and see â€œall activityâ€. You have to click like 2-3 things to get to the â€œall activityâ€ tab, then select comments or likes etc. even then, itâ€™s giving thousands of unnecessary notifications so the ones you want to see are buried. I can never get my notifications tab to not have notifications. Itâ€™s really irritating.

title: I recommend it
text: I like this platform a lot. There are some issues I have with it but over all I give it 5 stars. TikTok can be really entertaining and fun to use. You can create your platform and use it for anything.  I have seen dance videos, fan pages, food videos, tutorials, and even people trying to support there smal businesses. Although I do see so many young kids in this app. I do not recommend this app for kids 10 and under. There are videos that can have really inappropriate things shown. Also having pages (if there public which you can have your account private) your bound to get some hate. There are lots of people I have seen giving hate to people for no reason. The percentage of hate on this app is huge so if your a sensitive person I would suggest thinking it over before downloading this app. There is also lots of songs that go viral that could have inappropriate language in that you probably donâ€™t want to have your kid hearing. But overall scrolling through and making videos on TikTok can be very entertaining and I would still recommend getting the app.

title: Update
text: I really love tik tok. I have fallen in love with it because itâ€™s the only app I use since quarantine. But there should be a few changes such as who can see videos. like when you post a video for only your friends to see, but that should be customizable. We should be able to put who can see our tik tok out of our friends. Kinda like Instagram. Another thing is some times I want to make a video so I save the audio. But I save so many I canâ€™t even find it. There should be multiple folders so when you save them for example, dance sounds, challenges sounds, duet sounds, react sounds, ect. Also Iâ€™m not sure if this only happenedâ€™s to me but when Iâ€™m on my FYP then I want to see my following, when I swipe to the left it automatically refreshes my following page. Witch is annoying because I want to see the videos. I should be able to refresh like on my fyp not automatically do it for me. Also one last thing there should be a bigger limit to your bio and caption. Maybe just like 20 or 30 characters more. Thank you I really hope you consider these updates to make not just mine but a lot of the worlds app better.â¤ï¸

title: Pretty Decent
text: I really love the app, super fun! Love almost all the audios. Though there is lots of negative energy but itâ€™s social media so you canâ€™t expect too much. I just wish my videos were viewed more. Sometimes I would actually dedicate a decent amount of time for the creation of a tiktok only for it to get 20 views and 3 likes... but I do really enjoy watching other creators videos, very occupying and entertaining! I also feel as though videos that were not harmful in any shape, way or form get deleted/taken down and itâ€™s unfair to the creators who may have spent some time on it. During this time, many people are speaking up about the injustices happening (blm) and lots of those videos get taken down when they have not violated any of the guidelines which I personally think is unfair to not only the creator but the people who are also largely invested in the blm movement. But to conclude, this app is very fun for millions and to be honest-for me personally- this app has helped me get through some of my darkest times in 2020. And I feel as though Iâ€™m not the only one who really appreciates the joy that comes from many of the accounts on this app.

title: under 13/shadowbanning
text:
hi! ive been using tiktok daily for a few months now as a creator, and ive noticed a few problems.
firstly, i have about 2,800 followers. all of a sudden kids who look to be 7-10 (for SURE not the minimum age of 13!) are following me more than anyone my age (18.) i cosplay so i dont know if its because they see a cool costume or smthn and just follow, but i dont make content for children and removing child follower after child follower is really stressful! i even have 13+ in my bio :( please try to make sure there are only 13+ ppl on ur app. i understand a lot of it is also the parents fault, but maybe theres smthn u could do :/
also, shadowbanning and randomly deleted videos is a huge issue, especially now that BLM is on the rise. if tiktok really supports BLM, then why do my tiktoks on the topic get significantly less views/likes than all of my cosplay videos, even when my followers support the movement too? and i rarely use tags so i should have the same reach as always. please try to focus more on banning people who are spreading hate instead of the people who are working for positivity.
other than these (annoying) issues, i adore this app!! ive made so many friends on it. there are ao many different sides to tiktok, youll for sure find your niche.

title: TikTok Review
text: I really like the app TikTok! Itâ€™s a fun and funny app to be on! But this wouldnâ€™t be a review if I didnâ€™t complain. There are a few things about the app that make me mad! I love to make and post videos on TikTok but whenever I make my own sound and I want to watch it the app glitches and shuts out of it... I donâ€™t know if itâ€™s the app or my phone?? However I do love seeing the different dances, cooking, funny, and little vlogs on it! Sometimes it can be annoying when I am around my parents and the person swears or says something inappropriate. But I understand that they have the right to say those words but if a little kid watches your TikTokâ€™s what are they looking up to? Someone swearing? The app is really nice I love the effects and filters and different sounds on there. And I must say (sorry to offend anyone of the app Like) but I see ads for that app and they are doing the dance savage or the Laxed sound! Who came up with that dance was it TikTok or Like I wonder??  TikTok is a complete free app to be on and it great! I definitely rate it 5/5 but it can be frustrating sometimes to edit the videos and stuff but in the end with the effects it totally worth it!!

title: No offense, but this app ruined my cousin.

title: review for unsure parents and a few suggestions

title: Not responding to reported problems!
text:
TikTok. This is a great app! And I even find myself obsessive, very very obsessive. The app is just too hard to get off of, itâ€™s addicting! 
  My problem is, Iâ€™ve been hacked. Iâ€™ve reported my problems several times to you leaving my phone number to get contacted anytime. I havenâ€™t got any type of response, any text, etc. I really do enjoy this app, but I would like to keep up with trends and make different accounts. Iâ€™ve worked super hard for my 2500+ fans, and I would really like to keep them! 
  Also, I feel as if my app is draining a lot of my battery as well as taking up a lot of my storage. Iâ€™ve had to offload a TikTok a few times and so has my phone on its own. So basically because of this problem, I only have about two apps and about 68 pictures. I am factory restoring my phone this weekend, but I donâ€™t want to lose my whole Tik Tok account! Once you use your phone number, you have to use a different one! I hope you understand!- @.briannaysabel

title: Awful content moderation
text:
I donâ€™t know if itâ€™s a poorly developed and myopic moderation AI, obtuse moderators that donâ€™t take context into consideration at all, or both. Their moderators appear to only see explicit racial, gendered, and homophobic slurs as offensive. No recognition or consideration of dogwhistles, hate symbols, innuendo, or plausible deniability. When making reports, there isnâ€™t even space for users to provide that context. Bad UI decision, especially in this day and age. Even Twitter, with its terrible track record for moderation, at least offers that.

Things are only taken down when they are mass reported. Anything even slightly linguistically coded is immediately rebuffed and allowed to continue on the platform. Even if it is extremely violent, sexual, gruesome, or otherwise inappropriate. Cults that share hateful or deliberately misleading information are allowed to thrive. I would never let my kids on here and be exposed to that. Itâ€™s reprehensible that TikTok corporate isnâ€™t doing more to manage this major problem.

All of this boils down to truly one of the worst out there that Iâ€™ve encountered when it comes to content moderation, and the bar is incredibly low. This totally ruins the user experience of what is otherwise a generally enjoyable and entertaining content platform.

title: An app that changes your life in a bad way
text: I've tried to give TikTok a shot at being on my phone, and after a couple of weeks i found myself endlessly scrolling through whatever was recommended to me, and i took it of my phone because i realized that scrolling through this app makes time fly by, time that is VERY limited to one's life. The more you spend on this app the more you waste that precious time, doing other things that could be worth it. I've taken a step to stop being addicted to Social Media, but others haven't. Everyone has social media so much that it's essential to life, making friends, and just talking. I understand that deleting your social medias practically cut off all of things, but if you do, you just might find something that can be worth your time or change your life for the better. If it's taking the time to study for an exam needed to graduate, or spending time with your friends or family, it doesn't matter what you do as long as it's worth your time. You've probably heard this in another way, such as "get off the phone and go do something", but you've never had a reason as to why you should, until now. So if you're reading this, Find something worth your while, and even delete this app. After all, You might just benefit from doing so.

title: Stop adding and pushing features nobody wants
text: If youâ€™re going to start shoving live videos down our throats on our for you pages, at least give us the option to filter them out permanently. I despise the lives, especially the asmr ones, which honestly if they didnâ€™t exist I wouldnâ€™t be as miffed as I am. Every time I hear those disgusting mouth sounds, and click â€œnot interestedâ€ only to get another one ten minutes later a part of me dies. A part of me also died when the format for likes got changed to where instead of the notification in the inbox being cleared when you click on the inbox, you now have to click the little activities folder if you have more than two separate notifications. Every update the app developers give us sucky and inconvenient changes. What happened to product testing? Literally nobody likes the lives or the inbox thing. If people want to watch live videos good for them, and I get that itâ€™s being pushed because this app is run by money hungry ceos who donâ€™t actually care about the usability of the app as long as people still go on it, but Jesus Christ just let us filter them out. Youâ€™re not going to make any money off of the people that would use the anti live filter anyways, weâ€™re not going to watch them no matter how many times a dumb live pops up.

title: Okay overall. Promote feature kills free users chances tho
text: What could I possibly know about a multi billion dollar app right? Take my words with a grain of salt and do your own research. At this point tiktok makes you pay for exposure. Good content isnt enough anymore to develop a following making it harder for people without money to grow. Its practically impossible to reach 1k  followers without spending money. It cost me over 100US Dollars just to get my brand name out there and it left me with 240 ish followers. My personal account used to get thousands of views including positive engagement. If I can make good content consistently and grow organically less than a year ago. Then its only safe to assume that tik tok is drowning out the free users now. I understand they have to make money but they were doing fine beforehand and it seems like they have just got greedy ever since the promote feature became a thing. Small businesses and new startups resort to social media for growth and it used to be a good tool for people just starting out making original content. Being original and interesting isnt enough now.. the standard is â€œpay for viewâ€ now unless you already had a large following before the change.

title: Toxic to the youth
text: This app is nothing but pure and utter degeneracy. From showing half naked women doing provocative dances, to political toxicity and agendas being shoved down peopleâ€™s throats, from harmful agendas everywhere. The community is beyond toxic, and if you do something they do not approve of, they will ruin literally your life, by calling your employer in mass amounts until you get fired, they will email your principle until you are expelled from school, they will doxx you and reveal your home address and location of which you reside publicly. The toxic community has bulled an 11 year old into killing him self. The people who operate tik tok are not fair with whom they force to follow the community guidelines. There are pedophiles everywhere who still have a platfor. If you post anything that the mass community does not agree with on the app, they do their damned best to ruin your life, and ban you, but do not hold others to the same messed up standard. Young children are on this app and getting their brains completely melted and becoming brainwashed. Propaganda is everywhere, itâ€™s almost as if this app was created to merely cause harm to the people and youth especially of different western societies. If I was a parent, I would not let my child on this app under any circumstances. And any adults who are considering downloading it, Iâ€™m telling you I warned you.
